title: Hhampuz
author: Hhampuz
created_time: January 16, 2023, 12:00:16 PMLast edit: February 17, 2023, 09:58:07 PM by Hhampuz
content: Jackbit.com is a fairly new casino and sportsbook with an impressive UI, extensive catalogue of games on offer as well as a state of the art sportsbook. I can assure you that you won't be left disappointed or feel like something is missing if you play here. To help spread the word we are launching this signature campaign and if you are a quality gambling poster we want to hire YOU!Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 25 constructive posts each week that you participate in order to get paid.Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts in the gambling sections each week that you participate in order to get paid. These 10 will count towards the 25 post weekly requirement.Do not have legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member.If you receive legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member you may be removed without payment or notice.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, this thread, any campaign/bounty thread or boards where your signature isn't displayed will not count towards the weekly requirement.You need to have received a minimum of 10 merit in the last 120 days in order to join this campaign.Do not wear any other Signature or Avatars during your stay in this campaign, if you do you'll be removed without payment or notice.Do not enroll your main + alt account in this campaign, if you do you'll be removed and blacklisted from any and all of my campaigns.Each week will run from Saturdays > Fridays with the cut-off being Fridays at 23:59:59 according to my timezone (CET).Payments will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC address each Saturday.This campaign will be open for Hero Members and Legendary Members.Jackbit reserves the right to cancel and/or make changes to this campaign at their own discretion. Each started week will be paid in full.Payouts and Positions:5x Hero/Legendary Members - $75 in BTC/WeekThe Signatures:Sr
